scripts.dev: concurrently -n "be,fe" -c "green,blue" "cd apps/be && npm run dev" "cd apps/fe && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently -n "be,fe" -c "green,blue" "cd apps/be && npm run build" "cd apps/fe && npm run build"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "be,fe" -c "green,blue" "cd apps/be && npm run start" "cd apps/fe && npm run start"
